snippet.title: Craftomation 101 - Free Alpha - Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Play free alpha (web, windows, linux, mac): https://ludenio.itch.io/craftomation101
Craftomation 101 is a craft automation game about self-replicating machines and getting Mars ready for humans settlement. Inspired by Moore's 'Artificial Living Plants' (1956).

Please fill the form (1 min https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSfk7XX7MkP_j_7OYNr5lYvoeUluPHrjOyJGKDqrZ5tChzEBpw/viewform?usp=pp_url&entry.416926324=youtubetrailer42) or join our Discord (https://discord.gg/ludenio) to share your feedback with our tiny team, it's vital for us!
